name: Bubble CoCo: Color Match Bubble Shooter
name_original: Bubble CoCo: Color Match Bubble Shooter
description:
Aim, fire and burst colorful bubbles!

Are you ready to be the best bubble shooter? Pop your way to the Victory!

Explore the bubble pop adventures with CoCo the mother hen and her baby chicks.
More than 3,000 levels to go playing! You will find it very fun and addictive!
Well-designed levels with various game modes will take your breath away!

Easy to play. Be the greatest bubble shooter in the world!
Aim, shoot and blast color bubbles with excellent bubble shots! Match 3 or more same color bubbles to pop.

Bubble popping, bubble shooting fever!
Bubble shooting 10 combos to have super fever mode for higher scores! Lots of helpful boosters and items. The more you drop the bubbles, the higher your scores will be.

New levels, events and rewards!
Constant new game level updates. Enjoy diverse game events everyday and get rewards! Compete with other bubble shooters for better prizes : jewels, coins and boosters. Become the greatest bubble shooter.

Play with or without friends!
Send gifts, ask help requests and compete with friends to see who is the best color bubble shooter!

Colorful and high quality graphics.
Shoot and match color bubbles with CoCo the bubble shooter and her chicks. Complete daily quests and gain various cute costumes. Match the colorful fruit bubbles with same colors : red, blue, purple, yellow and green.

The best Bubble shooting game ever for you!
Perfect to blast away your boredom. Kill the boring time with Bubble blasting game. Enjoyable without the Internet connection or Wi-fi. Completely Free to play.
* Some optional in-game purchase may require the payment.

Please share your bubble popping, bubble shooting playing moment with other bubble shooters on our official fan page : https://www.facebook.com/playbubblecoco

Visit the Bubble CoCo Help Center : https://www.facebook.com/playbubblecoco
